CAPTION FIG1.png: 'Figure 1: This mood board explores the idea of an Augmented Reality tool that uses other senses than just sight for interaction.\n\n'
CAPTION FIG2.png: "Figure 2. Set of eleven mood boards for a luxurious clothing line. These mood boards explore the apparently conflicting elements of 'mobility', 'women drivers', and 'Russia'.\n\n"
CAPTION FIG3.png: 'Figure 3. The essence of model boards: this model board summarizes and communicates the findings from studies on model boards.\n\n'
CAPTION FIG4.png: 'Figure 4. The _Fanky Coffee Table_ and _Fanky Wall_ prototypes resulted from the two most boards presented in this paper.\n\n'
